title: They’re Still Covering Up This Major Scandal (Ep 1133)
description:
In this episode, I address the important takeaways from the IG report hearing yesterday. News Picks:New poll, majority of Americans oppose impeachment.

 

Impeachment is absolutely blowing up in the Democrats’ faces.

 

FBI Director Chris Wray is part of the problem.

 

Illegal border crossings are down 75% and experts credit President Trump. 

 

The NY Times gets caught promoting fake news, again.

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
